# Ideals generated by subsets of commutative rings

```agda
module commutative-algebra.ideals-generated-by-subsets-commutative-ringsᵉ where
```

<details><summary>Imports</summary>

```agda
open import commutative-algebra.commutative-ringsᵉ
open import commutative-algebra.ideals-commutative-ringsᵉ
open import commutative-algebra.poset-of-ideals-commutative-ringsᵉ
open import commutative-algebra.subsets-commutative-ringsᵉ

open import foundation.identity-typesᵉ
open import foundation.subtypesᵉ
open import foundation.universe-levelsᵉ

open import lists.concatenation-listsᵉ

open import ring-theory.ideals-generated-by-subsets-ringsᵉ
```

</details>

## Idea

Theᵉ **idealᵉ generatedᵉ byᵉ aᵉ subset**ᵉ `S`ᵉ ofᵉ aᵉ commutativeᵉ ringᵉ `R`ᵉ isᵉ theᵉ leastᵉ
idealᵉ thatᵉ containsᵉ `S`.ᵉ

## Definitions

### The universal property of the ideal generated by a subset

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Commutative-Ringᵉ l1ᵉ)
  (Sᵉ : subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Rᵉ)
  (Iᵉ : ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ) (Hᵉ : Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ)
  where

  is-ideal-generated-by-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    (lᵉ : Level) → UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ ⊔ l3ᵉ ⊔ lsuc lᵉ)
  is-ideal-generated-by-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ lᵉ =
    (Jᵉ : ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ lᵉ Rᵉ) →
    Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ →
    subset-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Jᵉ
```

### The ideal generated by a subset

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ : Level} (Rᵉ : Commutative-Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) (Sᵉ : subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Rᵉ)
  where

  formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ : UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ)
  formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ (ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) Sᵉ

  ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ → type-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
  ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    ev-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ (ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) Sᵉ

  preserves-concat-ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    (uᵉ vᵉ : formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ) →
    ( ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ (concat-listᵉ uᵉ vᵉ)) ＝ᵉ
    ( add-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ uᵉ)
      ( ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ vᵉ))
  preserves-concat-ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    preserves-concat-ev-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ
      ( ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)

  mul-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    type-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ →
    formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ →
    type-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ →
    formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ
  mul-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    mul-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ (ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) Sᵉ

  preserves-mul-ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    (rᵉ : type-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
    (uᵉ : formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ)
    (tᵉ : type-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) →
    ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ
      ( mul-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ rᵉ uᵉ tᵉ) ＝ᵉ
    mul-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      ( mul-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ rᵉ
        ( ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ uᵉ))
      ( tᵉ)
  preserves-mul-ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    preserves-mul-ev-formal-combination-subset-Ringᵉ
      ( ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)

  subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ring'ᵉ : type-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ → UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ)
  subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ring'ᵉ =
    subset-ideal-subset-Ring'ᵉ
      ( ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)

  subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ : subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ) Rᵉ
  subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    subset-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) Sᵉ

  is-in-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ : type-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ → UUᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ)
  is-in-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    is-in-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) Sᵉ

  contains-zero-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    contains-zero-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ
  contains-zero-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    contains-zero-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) Sᵉ

  is-closed-under-addition-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    is-closed-under-addition-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ
  is-closed-under-addition-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    is-closed-under-addition-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
      ( ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)

  is-closed-under-left-multiplication-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    is-closed-under-left-multiplication-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ
  is-closed-under-left-multiplication-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    is-closed-under-left-multiplication-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
      ( ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)

  is-closed-under-right-multiplication-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    is-closed-under-right-multiplication-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ
  is-closed-under-right-multiplication-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    is-closed-under-right-multiplication-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
      ( ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)

  is-closed-under-negatives-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    is-closed-under-negatives-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ
      subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ
  is-closed-under-negatives-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    is-closed-under-negatives-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
      ( ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)

  ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ : ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ (l1ᵉ ⊔ l2ᵉ) Rᵉ
  ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ) Sᵉ

  contains-subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ
  contains-subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    contains-subset-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
      ( ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)

  contains-formal-combinations-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    {l3ᵉ : Level} (Iᵉ : ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Rᵉ) →
    Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ subset-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ →
    (xᵉ : formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ) →
    is-in-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Iᵉ
      ( ev-formal-combination-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ xᵉ)
  contains-formal-combinations-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Iᵉ =
    contains-formal-combinations-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
      ( ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)
      ( Iᵉ)

  is-ideal-generated-by-subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    {lᵉ : Level} →
    is-ideal-generated-by-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ Sᵉ
      ( ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ)
      ( contains-subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ)
      ( lᵉ)
  is-ideal-generated-by-subset-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Iᵉ =
    is-ideal-generated-by-subset-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ
      ( ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ)
      ( Sᵉ)
      ( Iᵉ)

  is-closed-under-eq-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    {xᵉ yᵉ : type-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ} → is-in-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ xᵉ →
    (xᵉ ＝ᵉ yᵉ) → is-in-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ yᵉ
  is-closed-under-eq-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    is-closed-under-eq-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ

  is-closed-under-eq-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ring'ᵉ :
    {xᵉ yᵉ : type-Commutative-Ringᵉ Rᵉ} → is-in-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ yᵉ →
    (xᵉ ＝ᵉ yᵉ) → is-in-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ xᵉ
  is-closed-under-eq-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ring'ᵉ =
    is-closed-under-eq-ideal-Commutative-Ring'ᵉ Rᵉ ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ
```

## Properties

### The subset relation is preserved by generating ideals

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Aᵉ : Commutative-Ringᵉ l1ᵉ)
  (Sᵉ : subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Aᵉ) (Tᵉ : subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ l3ᵉ Aᵉ)
  where

  preserves-order-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    Sᵉ ⊆ᵉ Tᵉ →
    leq-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
      ( ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Sᵉ)
      ( ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Tᵉ)
  preserves-order-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    preserves-order-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ) Sᵉ Tᵉ
```

### The ideal generated by the underlying set of an ideal `I` is `I` itself

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ : Level} (Aᵉ : Commutative-Ringᵉ l1ᵉ) (Iᵉ : ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ l2ᵉ Aᵉ)
  where

  forward-inclusion-idempotent-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    leq-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
      ( ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ (subset-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ))
      ( Iᵉ)
  forward-inclusion-idempotent-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    forward-inclusion-idempotent-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ) Iᵉ

  backward-inclusion-idempotent-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    leq-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
      ( Iᵉ)
      ( ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ (subset-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ))
  backward-inclusion-idempotent-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    backward-inclusion-idempotent-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ) Iᵉ

  idempotent-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ :
    has-same-elements-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ
      ( ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ (subset-ideal-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ Iᵉ))
      ( Iᵉ)
  idempotent-ideal-subset-Commutative-Ringᵉ =
    idempotent-ideal-subset-Ringᵉ (ring-Commutative-Ringᵉ Aᵉ) Iᵉ
```
